Dear {{user_firstname}},

We see you have not yet completed the sign-up process in the program. Click on the following link to get started with mentoring:

{{url_signup}}

If you have any trouble signing up or have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Dear {{user_firstname}},

We see your profile is {{profile_completion_score}} complete. It is important that your profile is complete and detailed as it heps find better matches in the program. To complete your profile, please click on the link below.

{{url_profile_completion}}
